minecraftplayground.configuration.title: MinecraftPlayground Configs
minecraftplayground.configuration.redsto: Settings for redstone chain connections and network behavior
minecraftplayground.configuration.cableR: Visual settings for cable appearance and rendering
minecraftplayground.configuration.cableC: Color customization for powered and unpowered cables
minecraftplayground.configuration.maxCon: Maximum distance (in blocks) between two connected chain blocks. Connections beyond this distance are rejected.
Maximum number of connections allowed per chain block. Prevents visual clutter and performance issues.
minecraftplayground.configuration.update: How often to perform periodic network updates (in ticks). 20 ticks = 1 second. This acts as a backup to event-driven updates.
minecraftplayground.configuration.signal: How many ticks to wait before clearing cached signal after input is lost. Prevents flickering when power briefly turns off.
minecraftplayground.configuration.cableS: Number of segments to divide cable into (more = smoother curve).
minecraftplayground.configuration.cableT: Thickness of cable in blocks (0.03 = ~2 pixels).
minecraftplayground.configuration.cableS: Amount of sag at the middle of the cable (0.0 = no sag, -1.0 = full sag).
minecraftplayground.configuration.maxRen: Maximum distance to render cables (in blocks).
minecraftplayground.configuration.unpowe: Red component for unpowered cables (0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red).
minecraftplayground.configuration.powere: Base red component for powered cables (0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red).
Additional red component for powered cables based on power level (0.0 = no extra red, 1.0 = full extra red).
minecraftplayground.configuration.greenV: Green component for cables (0.0 = no green, 1.0 = full green).
minecraftplayground.configuration.blueVa: Blue component for cables (0.0 = no blue, 1.0 = full blue).
minecraftplayground.configuration.logDir: Whether to log the dirt block on common setup.
minecraftplayground.configuration.magicN: A magic number for testing purposes.
What you want the introduction message to be for the magic number.
A list of items to log on common setup.
